website_summaries.verdict: While it doesn't do that much to stand out from the crowded field of Bluetooth speakers in the $60-$100 range, the well-built and decent sounding (for its size) UE Mini Boom is a pretty safe choice for those looking for a very compact wireless speaker.
pros: The UE Mini Boom is a very compact Bluetooth speaker that has a built-in rechargeable battery, speakerphone capabilities, a line input, and ruggedized design
It sounds good for its small size and can be combined with a second Mini Boom to create a stereo pair
It sounds slightly better than its predecessor, the UE Mobile Boombox
cons: Yes, the Mini Boom's bass is slightly improved, but it still can't produce a ton of bass

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they don't make this mighty little speaker anymore.
customer_reviews.text: The UE Mini Boom is a classic Bluetooth speaker that lives up to it's name. With a ported rear speaker design the amount of bass is amazing when this titan is placed against a wall or in a corner. Highs are clear and the mid range is solid and not muddy. Battery life is insanely long and the speaker phone feature is a nice bonus. I've compared this to the model UE replaced this with and that speaker got returned the next day. Grab one of these while you still can. They don't make 'em like this anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Vedell

customer_reviews.title: ... not the smoothest communication technology - rather slow and easily disrupted and stutters when Norton does background house
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth is not the smoothest communication technology - rather slow and easily disrupted and stutters when Norton does background housekeeping. That said, this speaker was relatively easy to set up, but only seems to be able to pair with 1 device. If I am able to pair it with a second device, then it no longer works with the first one. Seems to be very sturdy and well built. Easy to operate, and sound is adequate. It's an OK device for the price if you get it on sale as I did.
customer_reviews.author: WMT

customer_reviews.title: Balanced, clear soundstage + more volume than previous model = winner!
customer_reviews.text: I love the clean, clear UE soundstage. Looking for more bass oomph? Then you need a larger speaker (basic sound mechanics). But this has plenty of bass in perfect balance with crystal clear mids and highs. It's also got plenty of volume, with little-to-no distortion even at max volume — and that's quite a feat. I returned the Mobile Boombox (the previous model) for lack of volume, though I loved the clear, balanced sound; this updated model has more than enough volume for my purposes, and that trademark clarion UE sound.
customer_reviews.author: BMCoop

customer_reviews.title: Good, Double Up is nice, but does not sound that great like all that hype they talk about it.
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok speaker. After hearing so much great reviews about it I decided to buy two of those for the Double Up function which is nice, but unfortunately the bass on those speakers don't sound that full. I used to have a JBL Charge that I sold in order to buy those, and the JBL have a better bass. Pos: Double Up function that allows two UE BOOMs to pair, they are small but with a good volume (not perfect, but good). Cons: Not full sound, they lack on bass. Some might find disturbing, but they don't come with charger. They charge through USB, but they come with an USB cable.
customer_reviews.author: Geffa Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Desktop Buddy!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a desktop speakers with premium sound quality n speaker functionality - LOOK NO FURTHER. I read about it in wirecutter.com n always turn to the website henceforth. It's at my desk while working n goes around the house with me. I guess that is what exactly expected of a portable Bluetooth speaker. Pairs upto 8 devices and autoshuts after 15 mins of Dormancy. Now with price drop even more budget buy!
customer_reviews.author: Olip

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is better than some of the $20-40 bluetooth speakers I have ...
customer_reviews.text: The UE MINI BOOM is not very reliable. I have difficulties staying connected to it. It will randomly go silent mid song. It also hums on a cycle as it charges. The sound quality is better than some of the $20-40 bluetooth speakers I have used. It is nowhere near the quality of the UE BOOM. I would return this if I hadn't thrown away the packaging
customer_reviews.author: LKontheLoose

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound.  Good for home or travel.
customer_reviews.text: I adore this little thing. I have had it for three years and continue to enjoy it. The sound is good. I live in a small condo where patios are adjoining and noise carries. I can comfortably hear my music in a relaxing mode without bothering my neighbors. I have also used it at a higher volume when in National Forest campgrounds, being farther away from others.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible speaker, huge, quality sound.
customer_reviews.text: Really fantastic sound. I found this product from the review on the Wirecutter and I'm glad I did. The sound is really well-balanced and perfect for an outdoor party on the deck. I liked it so much I bought a second and paired them. I like classical music and it is quite satisfying for that too. The app is very cool and easy to use, and the options to use two in stereo mode is awesome and sounds great. Highly highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, excellent battery life. I was really impressed with how the little thing can fill our entire back yard with sound! Options between Bluetooth and wired connections are a plus - if your playback device relies on a WiFi connection outdoors, you might want to grab a cable to connect. I had trouble getting my Samsung tablet to maintain both WiFi and Bluetooth. As far as I can tell, the sound quality is the same over Bluetooth and wired connections though. I would recommend this product, and UE generally!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Great BlueTooth speaker.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a second time. The sound that comes out of this little guy is awesome. We take it to the beach, the mountains, the porch, etc. I also take it on the road and play music in hotel rooms. Battery life is very good. I've used more expensive BlueTooth speakers, but they didn't sound this good.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Buy this jammy box tunetronic magic machine!
customer_reviews.text: JAMMY BOX FTW! This little guy is a sound powerhouse! Music sounds excellent. The set up was super easy. Only negative was that the bass was so strong it shook a glass candle off of one of my shelves while I was showering (scarred the heck outta me and I had to clean up a broken candle :/ but such is the price of great tunes!) Interface is easy. Little guy is also rugged (accidentally left out a night in the rain once and it is still bumping). Is lightweight and battery life is super solid.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Boland

customer_reviews.title: For its size it is super loud. Being able to pair 2 in stereo ...
customer_reviews.text: For its size it is super loud. Being able to pair 2 in stereo is really awesome as well. I would recommend getting 2. For a party use both. For personal use one. Wife was playing music from her phone on this and I thought she was using our surround sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: ... portable wireless speakers and the UE Mini BOOM got great reviews so I was really disappointed in the sound ...
customer_reviews.text: I researched portable wireless speakers and the UE Mini BOOM got great reviews so I was really disappointed in the sound quality. I did give it two stars for ease of use and design but the sound was awful. I am not a sound expert and just wanted a speaker that was clear and sounded good. The sound on this speaker was worse than if I just played my music through my phone speaker. It was very static and muddled. I wasn't even playing it loud. Just a terrible sound overall. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Jancek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mini speaker
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound from this little speaker. I've had several and this one is the best so far. The Bluetooth pairing was easy with one speaker... a bit harder with 2, but I got it to work. However, I could not get the pair to work when connected to my Macbook Air.
customer_reviews.author: A. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Pair Them For Stereo
customer_reviews.text: I like the form factor, but the sound quality sold me. After buying a second Mini Boom, I found the UE app on Google's Play store that adds the ability to pair two of the speakers together. You have two pairing options: Dual mono or true right-left channel stereo.
customer_reviews.author: Beatmoving

customer_reviews.title: Packs a punch
customer_reviews.text: great little speaker, packs a punch. Takes your music anywhere, love it for the bathroom, hotel rooms or just to carry around. Links quickly and flawlessly and lasts a long time on one charge. Thinking about getting a second one for stereo sound. Feels sturdy with its soft rubber cover and metal grates. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: There are nice features like being able to play from two phones
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect low frequencies to come out of this little guy. It is loud and we'll build. The battery seems sufficient. There are nice features like being able to play from two phones. I wish it had a wake on plug feature so I could put its charger on a switched plug and have the thing auto connect. It cuts out here and there when you walk away more than 20ft indoors, but this is better than many other BT devices.
customer_reviews.author: FDZ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound quality, surprisingly boom bass, long battery life, easy to use bluetooth pairing process, incredibly portable, stylish and loud, this was a fantastic buy.
customer_reviews.author: Yaron

customer_reviews.title: Wirecutter was right!
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to setup, and I love the color (Orange) of it! The sound is clear and for the price (I got it at $77) I thought it was a great deal. The sound only comes out of one end, but I found it to be adequately loud.
customer_reviews.author: Yemi Sobowale

customer_reviews.title: A good little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker. Decent volume. Great for inside and on the deck. Just don't expect huge sound. I gave it 4 stars because for the price I was expecting a little more.
customer_reviews.author: WKE

customer_reviews.title: Small size and weight
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little box. It connects easily and sounds really good for its size. It will not fill any size room with low end but is really clear and well balanced for background music. I carry it in my pack for listening at work. The small factor really motivates me to always have it with me.
customer_reviews.author: srsteve

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a little package, but does not deliver on the advertised range.
customer_reviews.text: The NFC paring made the Bluetooth setup very easy. I wish it had simple play/pause, forward, rewind buttons like many other speakers do. Also I have not been able to get the advertised 50 ft range out of the speaker--closer to 20-25ft.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K Friel

customer_reviews.title: but I don't think it does a great job at music reproduction and that makes it overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The MINI BOOM is a well designed and well built speaker, but I don't think it does a great job at music reproduction and that makes it overpriced. I have found the MINI excels at voice reproduction, I really enjoy listening to podcasts like 99% Invisible and Radiolab on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big Sound! Easy to use with Kindle!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new little speaker. It has a great big sound and is very easy to use with my Kindle, All my music and audiobooks sound much richer. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Puppy Cat

customer_reviews.title: Take it with you!
customer_reviews.text: I take this little guy everywhere. At first I thought I'd just use it when teaching yoga, but I love it so much, its sturdy and handy, and I take it everywhere and use it plenty just for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good volume and sound for its size; excellent porabilty; sound quality could be a bit better.
customer_reviews.text: Good volume and sound for its size, but not quite as tight as I was hoping for. Excellent as a small portable speaker; just ok as far as bleuthooth speaker go...
customer_reviews.author: Value Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound, easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: My second favorite to the mini Bose but still has great sound, just not as much base. Also this is really compact for traveling or taking with you!!
customer_reviews.author: CPills

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Paired easily to bluetooth devices, pretty loud for size and a good battery run time per charge.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Pitter

customer_reviews.title: Major boom from the Mini boom
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my teenage son, and wow, I can't believe the sound that comes out of this tiny little box! Sometimes we regret it when he's blasting away in the shower, but he just loves it, and I can see why.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. D.

customer_reviews.title: I'll Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: Well, what can I say. I read that it doesn't have much bass and it doesn't. It did sync easily. Sounds a bit tinny but works in a pinch. I'll keep looking though.
customer_reviews.author: homesteader finally

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this on sale at amazon and it works great. I am an older stereo guy with the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale at amazon and it works great. I am an older stereo guy with the big speakers and I can't believe what kind of sound you can get from this little box.
customer_reviews.author: W. Price

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works great. I almost didn't get it because there was a lot of negative reviews. I am honestly glad I got it. I have had no problems with it. I use it at work and my work is a harsh environment for electronics. I keep it in a plastic bag when at work. I have had it just over a month and it's still working great.
customer_reviews.author: kyle glass

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a great speaker but sometimes the charge doesn't last as long as it should.
customer_reviews.author: cjruiz

customer_reviews.title: WILL PROBABLY BUY ANOTHER FOR STEREO SOUND!
customer_reviews.text: Kind of light on the "lows" but really decent sound quality and loudness for a portable speaker.
customer_reviews.author: SassyDIY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound and very portable. I use it in my studio.
customer_reviews.author: Jmclmac

customer_reviews.title: Okay speaker, but not the best
customer_reviews.text: I like the mini boom, it is annoying that you have to have the mini boom app to play music. The sound is good but not great, it sounds hollow, that's the only way to describe it. I have had a few mini speakers in the past that sounded better, and cost only $30.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Survived a boat ride in monsoon weather
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good, bass is good, easy to connect on iOS, Android, and even from a Macbook. Sturdy little thing, survived a boat ride in monsoon weather with choppy waves. An iPod and a phone both slid into the river, but this thing clinged on like it was no big deal. Will be buying another one soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Tori K

customer_reviews.title: could be better
customer_reviews.text: sounds better at loud volumes than lower ones, which stinks because i use it in my office where volume has to be kept low.
customer_reviews.author: MtLrlNJ_Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Good little speaker with solid clarity and loudness. Decent battery life too. Only negative would be the relatively weak bass but that's to be expected with a smaller speaker like this. Overall definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: N.W.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality, when it's connected.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality. Unfortunately when paired with a Mac it often disconnects between videos or while videos are paused. This has been a known problem for over a year, and Logitech has yet to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I love the speaker, The one think I don't like is bluetooth. It has it limitations but the speakeing is amazing for sound and the battery seems to last a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Brinton

customer_reviews.title: so awesome! Really good sound for size and price
customer_reviews.text: So cute, so tiny, so awesome! Really good sound for size and price!
customer_reviews.author: Encino, CA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound from such a small speaker....... very satisfied....
customer_reviews.author: Grinder

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, small enough to fit pretty much anywhere. We love the bright orange color. Sounds amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jack DeGiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Speaker looked brand new and works great. A great deal at half the price of a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality sound for a small package
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality sound for a small package! Recommend buy in pairs. Use the APP to run them in stereo and your ears will enjoy the tunes!!
customer_reviews.author: Duane R. Gunsch, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound for such a small device
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound for such a small device! Battery life is good and Bluetooth signal is strong within 30 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Z

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker! It's easy to use and set up with great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Linda C. Sanicola

customer_reviews.title: Nice build quality, but a step back from the Logitech Mini Boombox.
customer_reviews.text: I moved to the MINI BOOM from the Logitech Mini Boombox. The build quality feels very sturdy on this device, I like the use of micro USB for charging and the available app is a nice touch. I perceive the predecessor had a bit more bass where this speaker has more mids. Additionally, I miss the buttons to be able to skip a track directly on the device. You don't realize how valuable that feature is until it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Palmero

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, syncs easily with android phone, price wasnt bad, good range as well, recommend
customer_reviews.author: Paul E.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound and easy to use. Caution, be careful not to stray too far as your bluetooth may only work within a limited radius.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart W Grande

customer_reviews.title: perfect for inside and out.
customer_reviews.text: Solid speaker, good sound and volume for multiple uses and it is very portable.
customer_reviews.author: Derek C. Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Wish it would switch between devices easier
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good sound, though I wish I didn't have to go into my iOS settings every time I want to use a different source device.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenage daughter....seems to be loud enough for her!
customer_reviews.author: lydiatat

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for his birthday and he/we love it! There are quite a few small Bluetooth speakers on the market, but after doing some research and reading Amazon reviews we chose to go with the UE mini boom over the JawBone. The music quality is awesome, much better than listening to music off our phone. It's obviously not as great as listening to music on our surround sound stereo, but that is/was expected when I purchased this! The size of this speaker is the best part! It's nice and compact, making it perfect to travel with! I definitely would recommend the UE mini boom, the price it also considerably less than the comparable JawBone!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this speaker, especially for the cost. The sound quality is clean and the benefit of attaching two devices and having them ready to play through this unit is very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I can tell you I gave this as a gift, and the recipient LOVES it..
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bowab

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Synching the two units for stereo sound was a breeze. Connecting to my IPad even easier. Sound did not disappoint me, it lived up to its specs.
customer_reviews.author: Sivadhr

customer_reviews.title: Buy this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Very loud speaker. Not the best sound quality but very good. Probably the best speaker for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Dru Ann Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Small size, great sound.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs lots of great sound. Use it all the time and love it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Healy

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for. The mega boom is better.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at work. Running 5 Industrial printers in a big open room you can’t even hear it. Even turned all the way up you still couldn’t hear it unless your standing right in front of it. the sound quality itself could be better it was crackly after you got it over half volume. I returned it and bought the UE Mega Boom. That you can hear! And it has a great Bluetooth range. I can go pretty much anywhere in the facility and can still hear it and it won’t kick me off Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Just Ok
customer_reviews.text: The speaker is very loud. its loud but it sounds TERRIBLE. I ended up returning mine and bought a beats pill on ebay for $70 if you intend to listen to music very quietly then i guess you can get this speaker... but it still sounds like a $20 speaker and not an eighty dollae speaker
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 1 month ago and I love it. Amazing little thing
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT! The only thing I would want it ...
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT! The only thing I would want it to list is that it doesn't come with a charger.
customer_reviews.author: BLoyd

customer_reviews.title: This speaker is absolutely awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Took a chance ordering this speaker, hoping it would be as good as other reviewers have said. Well, they have spoken the truth!! I've been playing around with the speaker for a week now, and I absolutely love it. Great sound for such a mini speaker, bluetooth connects easily, and it's so portable! I've spent days with it outside working in the yard, playing some frisbee at my friends house, etc. This speaker is tough and ready for anything you throw at it. Now I just need to get a solar charger and voila - my new camping audio experience. BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.author: Ghislain Courcelles

customer_reviews.title: but I have the big UE Boom to compare it to and it is just not as good.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay, but I have the big UE Boom to compare it to and it is just not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Jonas Ekerhovd

customer_reviews.title: This product is not working. Cannot pair with my ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is not working. Cannot pair with my phone and laptop. I need to return, or get refund.
customer_reviews.author: Eun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small device with great sound... Would love to have one for every room and to give away
customer_reviews.author: colette

product_meta.title: UE MINI BOOM Wireless Bluetooth Speaker - Orange
product_meta.description: Ultimate Ears MINI BOOM Wireless Speaker / Speakerphone HUGE SOUND. UE MINI BOOM is the surprisingly small ultra-compact speaker with unexpectedly huge, jaw-dropping sound. Stream music from your Bluetooth smartphone or tablet to enjoy crystal clear sound with deep bass and powerful punch. Ultra-portable (2.4 in. high) powerful sound View larger Effortless music streaming from your Bluetooth smartphone or tablet 10 HR BATTERY LIFE UE MINI BOOM pumps out up to 10 hours* of huge sound so you can play all day. Recharge the built-in lithium-ion battery with the convenience of the included micro-USB cable and keep playing all night. (*Rechargeable batteries have a limited number of charge cycles. ) 50 FT WIRELESS UE MINI BOOM wirelessly streams music from Bluetooth enabled devices from up to 50 ft away; over 50% farther than most other Bluetooth speakers. ** You can take turns playing from two different devices and you can use NFC to connect with NFC-supported devices. (**Actual wireless range will vary with use, settings and environmental conditions. ) ADD A SECOND SPEAKER For truly epic stereo sound, wirelessly connect two UE MINI BOOMs via the UE MINI BOOM mobile app. Sit back and enjoy as the best details of your favorite songs surround you in true stereo. PLAY EVERYWHERE The ultra-compact design, simple controls and crystal-clear speakerphone make UE MINI BOOM the perfect companion for your life on the go. Whether you're traveling, hanging out with friends or just kicking back and watching a concert on your tablet at home, UE MINI BOOM fits right in. Available in five great colors View larger Product Snapshot Powerful ultra-compact speaker doubles as a speakerphone 10-hour rechargeable battery* 50 ft Bluetooth wireless range** Compatible with popular Bluetooth enabled smartphones and tablets
feature_bullets: Huge Sound: UE MINI BOOM is the small speaker that delivers unexpectedly bold, jaw-dropping sound with crystal clear highs and deep bass
Add a Second Speaker: Wirelessly connect two UE MINI BOOMs together in stereo via the UE MINI BOOM app to double up the awesomeness with even huger sound
Party Longer: The rechargeable lithium-ion battery pumps out up to 10 hours of party-driving beats
Better Wireless: Stream music from any Bluetooth enabled device from up to 50 ft; 50% farther than most other Bluetooth speakers
Music Everywhere: It is the perfect companion for your on-the-go lifestyle-ultra-compact design, simple controls and a crystal-clear speakerphone
